item.title: Discuss bible?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

last time i was invited to a bible discussion, half the people there stopped believing in the bible, and i was never invited back, although they did lose some of their followers. although i respect every religion, i find majority of the bible as B.S and Jesus Christ c’mon, if u say i believe in god ok, i guess that’s fine, but if u say i believe in son of god who is a mortal nah not so.

item.title: Discuss bible?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:20, topic:381967”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=477772.msg3496678#msg3496678 date=1297374838]

The Bible has been corrupted by catholics, they have changed around shit in there.
It’s sad, the illuminati has infiltrated Christianity, and are going completely against the Bible.

Example: Praying to mother mary repeatedly, The rosary teachers are always wearing the cross, masonic symbolism on churches, the pope talking about a New World Order… etc.

I don’t even go to church anymore, or read the bible often, because I don’t know who to trust. I’d rather talk to Jehovah in private by myself.

But, most of the stuff in Revelation is coming true.

I’m not even going to flame the above person, because you know what, he isn’t worth it.
When the time comes, everyone will see, and be sorry.

To all the true believers of Jehovah, read this verse, when the time comes, you will need it:

“Let anyone who has an ear listen: If you are to be taken captive, into captivity you go; if you kill with the sword, with the sword you must be killed. Here is a call for the endurance and faith of the saints.” - Revelation 13:9-10

Fixed your spelling errurz
I’m Muslim.
[/quote]

LOL, I typed that in a hurry, :p.

I have a great respect for Muslims, Islam is the only uncorrupted faith, and it is very pure.
It is this religion that would have saved Michael Jackson.[/quote]
AMG
The first guy I see who doesn’t hate on Islam!
